name: Scribble Ships
description: Scribble Ships is a 2D top-down arcade shooter that tosses the player into a world of color and chaos. With a range of ships to choose from, the player is tasked with coloring the monochromatic enemies that are trying to take your color away.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Video Memory Storage: 152 MB available space
